e-com.title: E-commerce Website Development Project
e-com.detail: Development of an e-commerce website using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without using a framework, as I did not have knowledge of frameworks at that time. The website can handle user authentication, product management, shopping cart system, and order processing effectively.

mytask.title: Internal Project Management System Development
mytask.detail: Development of an internal project management system that helps improve collaboration by creating and tracking projects, assigning tasks, defining user roles, and updating information in real-time. Used Vue.js, Nuxt 3, Vuetify for Frontend and Node.js for Backend.

builtin.title: Skill-Building Project While Job Hunting
builtin.detail: Developed a project using Frontend technologies such as NextJS, React, and MUI for managing the UI. The Backend was built with Node.js, Express, and MySQL, incorporating authentication and various modules for project management. This project was presented to a built-in company, where it was well-received by the management. However, further progress was halted due to contract agreement issues.

about.title: About Me
about.des: Hello üôè My name is Chatupol Singkrajom, and I am a software developer with experience in developing Fullstack web applications using React, Vue, Nuxt3, Node.js, and MySQL. I am capable of developing both Frontend and Backend, but I specialize and have a strong expertise in Frontend development. I am also eager to learn new technologies to create efficient applications that meet user needs. I look forward to the opportunity to apply my skills to contribute to an organization. üéâ
